languages.text: "Вы очень далеко зашли, {name}, чтобы получить ответы на свои вопросы. Было бы просто жестоко не удовлетворить ваше любопытство".
"You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."
languages.original_text: "Вы очень далеко зашли, {name}, чтобы получить ответы на свои вопросы. Было бы просто жестоко не удовлетворить ваше любопытство".

traits.locale_text: "You have come so far, {name}, to find the answers to your questions, that it would be too cruel to not sate your curiosity."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You have come so far, {name}, to find the answers to your questions, that it would be too cruel to not sate your curiosity."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You have come so far, {name}, to find the answers to your questions, it would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsated."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You have come so far, {name}, to find the answers to your questions, it would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsated."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} de si loin pour trouver des réponses, {name}. Il serait bien cruel de ne pas assouvir votre curiosité. »
languages.original_text: "You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|venu|venue} de si loin pour trouver des réponses à vos questions, {name}. Il serait bien cruel de ne pas assouvir votre curiosité. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Ha venido en busca de respuestas, {name}. Sería una crueldad dejar su curiosidad insatisfecha».
languages.original_text: "You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."

traits.locale_text: «Ha llegado muy lejos en busca de respuestas, {name}. Sería una crueldad no satisfacer su curiosidad».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “为了寻找答案，你一路走了这么远，{name}。如果我不愿满足你的好奇心，那恐怕就太残忍了。”
languages.original_text: "You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."

traits.locale_text: “你一路走了这么远，{name}，不过是为了找到答案罢了。如果我不愿满足你的好奇心，那恐怕就太残忍了。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ihr seid auf der Suche nach Antworten so weit gekommen, {name}. Es wäre grausam, Eure Neugier unbefriedigt zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seit so weit gekommen, {name}, um die Antworten auf Eure Fragen zu finden. Es wäre grausam, Eure Neugier unbefriedigt zu lassen."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「遥々よくぞお越しくださった、{name}。わざわざ、答えを追求するためにここまで来られたとは。好奇心を満たさずにおくのは、残酷にすぎるというものだ」
languages.original_text: "You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."

traits.locale_text: 「遥々よくぞお越しくださった、{name}。わざわざ、答えを追求するためにここまで来られたとは。好奇心を満たさずにおくのは、残酷にすぎるというものだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Sorularına cevap bulmak için onca yol gelmişsin {name}. Merakını gidermemek çok zalimce olurdu."
languages.original_text: "You have come so far in pursuit of answers, {name}. It would be too cruel to leave your curiosity unsatisfied."
